info.title: Scheduling Legacy API v1
info.description:
Legacy v1 Platform API endpoints for scheduling domain including appointments, bookings, services, and availability.

## Rate Limiting

Several endpoints in this API are rate-limited:
- **GET /scheduling/appointments**: Rate limited per business. Returns 429 with error_code `APPOINTMENTS_LIMIT_EXCEEDED` when exceeded.
- **POST /scheduling/bookings**: Rate limited per business. Returns 429 with error_code `BOOKING_LIMIT_EXCEEDED` when exceeded.

## Pagination

- **Appointments**: Default page size is 25, maximum is 25. Page numbers start at 1.
- **Bookings**: Uses offset-based pagination with `offset` and `per_page` parameters.

## Error Codes

Common error codes returned by these endpoints:
- `PARAMETER_MISSING`: Required parameter not provided
- `TIMESLOT_UNAVAILABLE`: Requested time slot is not available
- `ALREADY_REGISTERED`: Client already registered for this event
- `BOOKING_VIOLATION`: Client not allowed to register for this service
- `RESCHEDULE_VIOLATION`: Rescheduling not allowed or time limit exceeded
- `MATTER_DELETED`: Associated matter has been deleted

get.description:
Get appointments list for a business. This endpoint is rate-limited per business.

**Rate Limit:** Returns 429 with `APPOINTMENTS_LIMIT_EXCEEDED` when rate limit is exceeded.

parameters.description: Business ID. If not provided, uses the business associated with the authenticated user.
parameters.name: business_id

parameters.description: Filter by client ID
parameters.name: client_id

parameters.description: Filter by staff ID
parameters.name: staff_id

parameters.description: Filter by appointment state(s). Multiple states can be comma-separated. Valid values: rejected, scheduled, done, cancelled, pending_reschedule, reschedule. Example: state=done,rejected
parameters.name: state

parameters.description: Filter appointments starting from this time (ISO 8601 format)
parameters.name: start_time

parameters.description: Filter appointments ending before this time (ISO 8601 format)
parameters.name: end_time

parameters.description: Filter appointments created on or after this date (ISO 8601 format)
parameters.name: from_created_date

parameters.description: Filter by specific appointment UIDs (comma-separated)
parameters.name: uids

parameters.description: Filter by initiator. Set to true to only show staff-initiated appointments
parameters.name: initiate_by_staff

parameters.description: Group results by a field
parameters.name: group_by

parameters.description: Sort order. Format: field:direction. Multiple sort fields can be comma-separated. Example: updated:DESC,start_at:ASC,created:DESC
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Page number of results. Default: 1
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Default: 25. **Maximum: 25** (requests for more will be capped)
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response
parameters.name: fields

429.description: Rate limit exceeded. Error code: APPOINTMENTS_LIMIT_EXCEEDED

parameters.description: Appointment id
parameters.name: appointment_id

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

get.description:
Get bookings for a client. Returns appointments and event attendances associated with the authenticated client.

**Note:** If `matter_uid` is provided, returns bookings for that conversation/matter. Otherwise, returns bookings for the authenticated client.

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return per page
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: Page offset (0-based). Combined with per_page for pagination. Example: per_page=10, offset=1 returns records 11-20
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Business UID
parameters.name: business_id

parameters.description: Matter/Conversation UID. When provided, returns bookings for this specific matter instead of the client
parameters.name: matter_uid

parameters.description: Filter by specific booking UIDs (comma-separated)
parameters.name: uids

parameters.description: If true, returns only past bookings. If false (default), includes future bookings and virtual recurring instances
parameters.name: passed

parameters.description: Filter bookings starting after this time (ISO 8601 format). Defaults to current time if not specified
parameters.name: start_time

parameters.description: Filter bookings starting before this time (ISO 8601 format). Defaults to 2 years from start_time if not specified
parameters.name: end_time

parameters.description: Client's browser timezone for proper time display
parameters.name: browser_time_zone

parameters.description: Include waitlist entries in results. Default: false
parameters.name: include_waitlists

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

post.description:
Create a new booking (appointment or event registration).

**Rate Limit:** This endpoint is rate-limited per business. Returns 429 with `BOOKING_LIMIT_EXCEEDED` when exceeded.

**Booking Types:**
- **Appointment**: Requires `service_id`, `staff_id`, and either `start_time` or `optional_times`
- **Event**: Requires `event_instance_id`
- **Multi-booking**: Requires `service_id` as an array with multiple services

**Validation:**
- Client restrictions are checked - some services may not allow certain clients to book
- Deleted matters will return `MATTER_DELETED` error

booking_type.description: Type of booking: 'appointment', 'event', or 'multi_booking'. Auto-detected based on parameters if not provided

service_id.description: Service UID. Required for appointments. Can be an array for multi-bookings (comma-separated or array)

start_time.description: Booking start time in ISO 8601 format. Required for immediate approval appointments. Either start_time or optional_times must be provided

optional_times.description: Array of proposed times for single-choice approval mode. Either start_time or optional_times must be provided

event_instance_id.description: Event instance UID. Required for event bookings

client_id.description: Client UID. If not provided, uses authenticated client

matter_uid.description: Matter/Conversation UID to associate the booking with

waitlist_uid.description: Waitlist UID if converting from waitlist to booking

time_zone.description: Timezone for the booking. Default: UTC

preferred_language.description: Preferred language for new client creation

form_data.description: Additional form data. Required when service location is 'Client will set the address at booking' - include meeting_interaction_details in meeting_details

412.description: Precondition failed - booking violation or deleted matter

application/json.error: Not allowed to register to this service

422.description: Validation failed - timeslot unavailable or already registered

post.description:
Cancel a booking (appointment or event attendance).

**Booking Type Detection:**
- If `event_instance_id` is provided, treated as event cancellation
- Otherwise, treated as appointment cancellation

booking_id.description: Booking (appointment or event attendance) UID to cancel

event_instance_id.description: Event instance UID. Include this for event cancellations

message.description: Optional cancellation message to send to the business

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to cancel this booking

put.description:
Update the RSVP state of a booking. This is used for confirming attendance.

**Important:** Only `confirmed` is a valid RSVP state. Any other value will return a 403 Forbidden error.

parameters.description: Booking UID (appointment, event_instance, or event_attendance)
parameters.name: booking_uid

parameters.description: New RSVP state. **Only 'confirmed' is valid.** Any other value returns 403 Forbidden
parameters.name: new_rsvp_state

business_id.description: Business UID. Either business_id or portal_id is required

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

403.description: Forbidden - Invalid RSVP state (only 'confirmed' is allowed) or not authorized

parameters.description: Event attendance UID
parameters.name: event_attendance_uid

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

404.description: Not Found - Event attendance not found

parameters.description: The id of the event instance
parameters.name: event_instance_id

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

404.description: Not Found - Event instance not found

post.description:
Register for an event waitlist. When the event has available spots, waitlisted clients can be converted to attendees.

**Use Case:** When an event is full, clients can join the waitlist to be notified when spots become available.

event_instance_id.description: Event instance UID to join waitlist for

client_id.description: Client UID. If not provided, uses authenticated client

matter_uid.description: Matter/Conversation UID to associate the waitlist entry with

time_zone.description: Client's timezone for proper time display

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

put.description: Cancel a waitlist registration. Removes the client from the event waitlist.

event_instance_uid.description: Event instance UID to cancel waitlist for

client_uid.description: Client UID. If not provided, uses authenticated client

matter_uid.description: Matter/Conversation UID associated with the waitlist entry

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to cancel this waitlist entry

404.description: Not Found - Waitlist entry not found
